overview: A desktop-only web application for tracking Meteora DLMM positions across multiple Solana wallets without requiring wallet connections.

core.name: Manual Wallet Input
core.description: Users manually add wallet addresses (no direct wallet connection required)

core.name: Position Tracking
core.description: Display current position value, profit/loss metrics, and fees earned

core.name: Historical Data
core.description: Show performance charts and historical trends over time

core.name: Multi-Wallet Support
core.description: Track unlimited wallets with custom labeling

dataDisplay.name: Real-time Updates
details: 5-minute periodic data refresh via REST API calls

multiWalletManagement.name: Portfolio Overview
multiWalletManagement.description: Combined view across all tracked wallets

multiWalletManagement.name: Individual Views
multiWalletManagement.description: Detailed breakdowns per wallet or wallet group

multiWalletManagement.name: Search/Filter
multiWalletManagement.description: Find specific wallets or positions quickly

technicalRequirements.localStorage: Cache wallet addresses and basic position data

userInterface.dashboard: Overview of all tracked wallets and total portfolio metrics
userInterface.positionViewer: Detailed position views with charts and historical data
